text: قَالُوٓا۟ أَوَلَمْ تَكُ تَأْتِيكُمْ رُسُلُكُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ ۖ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ ۚ قَالُوا۟ فَٱدْعُوا۟ ۗ وَمَا دُعَـٰٓؤُا۟ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ

translation.en.sahih: They will say, "Did there not come to you your messengers with clear proofs?" They will say, "Yes." They will reply, "Then supplicate [yourselves], but the supplication of the disbelievers is not except in error."
translation.id.indonesian: Penjaga Jahannam berkata: "Dan apakah belum datang kepada kamu rasul-rasulmu dengan membawa keterangan-keterangan?" Mereka menjawab: "Benar, sudah datang". Penjaga-penjaga Jahannam berkata: "Berdoalah kamu". Dan doa orang-orang kafir itu hanyalah sia-sia belaka.
